title: jyOti mayamAna (kaNNIgaL)
sahitya:
jyOti mayamAna (kaNNIgaL).  rAgA:  kurinji.  Adi tALA.


1:  jyOti mayamAna lingam shuddha caitanya lingam
 caraNam 2    Adi antamillingam anbirkkoLi tarum lingam
 caraNam 3    ulagirkk-AdhAra lingam uyirgaTkellAm mUla lingam
 caraNam 4    umaiyAL tozhum svayambhu lingam uragAbharaNa shiva lingam
 caraNam 5    muktar virumbum bhUtalingam mukkaT-karumbAm Atma lingam
 caraNam 6    bhaktargaLurum vishva lingam pAvanamAm nAgalingam
